definition: to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)

sentences.english: Add more logs to fortify the fence.
There are the deer outside the palings," went on the Banyan deer.
sentences.chinese: 还有那在围篱之外的鹿。

sentences.english: All spectators must stay behind the double-fencing along the route.
sentences.chinese: 所有沿着路线的观众必须站在两层围篱之后。

sentences.english: The first day the boy had driven 37 nails into the fence.
sentences.chinese: 第一天，这个男孩在围篱上钉下了37根钉子。

sentences.english: We need a fence to keep the dogs off the grass.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要个围篱，不让狗狗践踏草坪。

definition: Muzha (old spelling: Mucha), suburb to the southeast of Taipei
